document.webtitle: Jarrod Whaley | The Glass Slipper | Cinequest | Features&Columns
document.description: The Glass Slipper isn't the usual kind of encounter ... Katros gave me a sample of Rosenbaum's table talk ... and his father was the regional manager of a fast- food restaurant ...
document.body:

Features&Columns
Landscape View Palo Alto filmmaker Jarrod Whaley brings his fine second feature, 'The Glass Slipper,' to Cinequest—part of a new era of sophistication in the local indie scene February 24, 2011 - by Richard von Busack
